subanswer.text: John has 13 Lego sets, and each Lego set is sold for $11926081. So he gets 13 * $11926081 = $154752523 dollars from selling all his Lego sets. The answer is 154752523.

direct_answer.text:
Before selling his Legos, John had 13 sets. After selling all of them, he had no Lego sets left. The answer is: 0.

Hint 2: How many video games can John afford if he spends all but $1926081 of the money he received from selling his Lego sets? If we let x be the number of video games John can afford, then we want to find a value of x such that (number of Lego sets he sold) * ($11926081 per Lego set) + (x video games) * ($20 per video game) = $154752523 - $1926081. That is, 13 * 11926081 + x * 20 = 138981612.
